intro: Trieenea occulta, commonly known as the hidden trienea, is a rare and enigmatic plant species found in specific tropical regions. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and vines. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered leaves and delicate, fragrant flowers that bloom in the early morning. Its roots are known to contain unique chemical compounds that have attracted scientific interest. Due to its elusive nature and limited habitat, Trieenea occulta remains a subject of ongoing botanical research.
